header.subtopicTwo: And numerous smiles on our clients' faces.
header.subtopicThree: Whether you are Retail Client or a Wholesale one, we have an offer for you.

services.heading: About the product
services.text-two: Our products come from the nature to your front door. We do not use pesticides and fertilizers when growing aronia's shrubs.
services.text-three: Our products have been carefully inspected and certified by Balkan Biocert. You can check our certificate from the following link: http://blah.com

interesting.heading: Did you know..?
interesting.p-one: Overwhelming presence of antioxidants in aronia helps preventing and reducing the risk of diseases caused by oxidative stress. Maintaining high elasticity and permeability of normal blood vessel walls, chokeberry juice lowers blood pressure, purifies the vascular wall of atherosclerotic plaques. Fresh juice aronia, taken in 50 ml three times a day has an excellent clinically proven effect against hypertension. It is invaluable for prophylactic and rehabilitation after stroke, heart attack and other diseases of the cardiovascular system.
interesting.p-two: The aronia berries is characterized by a real richness of vitamins and minerals. The highest content is of vitamin P. Significant is the amount of potassium (K), calcium (Ca), phosphorus (P), magnesium (Mg), iron (Fe) and among the trace elements the best provided are iodine (I), manganese (Mn), copper (Cu), molybdenum (Mu). Not fewer are the organic acids - citric, malic and succinic. Representative is the amount of pectin, tannins and coloring matter.

products.set-header: * Contact us for more information about the current price of each product. *

aronia-juice.title: 100% Organic Aronia Juice
aronia-juice.content: We offer you 100% cold-pressed and pasteurized chokeberry juice! It has beneficial effects on metabolism, blood formation and promotes regeneration of muscle and bone tissue. Aronia juice is suitable for diabetics because of its lack of saccharose and high content of sorbitol.

aronia-fresh.title: Fresh Organic Chokeberries
aronia-fresh.content: Fresh aronia berries have pleasant taste. They are rich in vitamins and polyphenols and are used as natural source of antioxidants in variety of healthy diets. Fruits are recommended mainly for the prevention and cotreatment of cardiovascular diseases and dieabetes.

aronia-dried.title: Dried Organic Aronia
aronia-dried.content: The dried organic chokeberries have all healthy ingredients that are found in the fresh fruit, but in higher concentration. Dried fruits are ready for immediate consumption. They can be used for the preparation of various dishes and drinks (tea, etc.).

aronia-powder.title: Organic Aronia Powder
aronia-powder.content: The powder has no preservatives and no color additive. It is made of 100% micronized dried organic aronia. Easy to store and use. You can add it to your yoghurt or flour for example. It improves the metabolism and strenghtens the immune system.

sub-pages.note-text: There is no evidence that the aronia consumption has negative effect on the human health both in healthy and ill individuals.
sub-pages.infoLink: Learn more about the health beneficial effects of aronia consumption

dried.intro: The dried organic chokeberries are easy for storage and consumption. They taster bitter-sweet, and are wonderful addition to every helathy diet because of their richness of antioxidants.
dried.applicationText: The fresh well matured clean chokeberries are let to dry in suitable environment. After the process of drying has finished, the dried chokeberries are ready for consumption. They can be used for the preparation of various dishes and jams. In the gastronomy it is also used as natural source of strong purple color pigment. Most of the healthy ingredients of the chokeberries remain in the dried fruit. That is why its benefits for the human health are comparable with those induced by the consumption of others aronia products (fresh, juice, etc.). Aronia berries are recommended for cotreatment of various diseases such as diabetes, cardiovascular diseases, metabolic syndrome and others.
dried.storeText: Store in dry and cool places.
dried.recipesText: First, infuse 1 tablespoon crushed dried fruit in 250ml boiling water. Then wait for about 5 minutes and filter the tea. You can mix it usually also with green or black tea.

fresh.intro: Fresh organic aronia berries are the fruit of plants, grown on the best agricultural land in Bulgaria, the black soil of Dobrudzha.
fresh.applicationText: Fresh aronia berries have a pungent but pleasant sweet taste. They are rich in vitamins and polyphenols and are used as natural source for antioxidants. Fruits are recommended for the prevention and cotreatment of mainly cardiovascular diseases, and diabetes type 2.
fresh.storeText: Unlike other fruits the chokeberries can be stored for several weeks without special requirements for the air temperature. Placed in ordinary crates, in well-ventilated place at room temperature, the aronia berries do not rot or get moldy but. They rather dry gradually. If you want the fruit to stay fresh for longer, put them in the refrigerator.

juice.intro: We offer you a high-quality product: 100% cold-pressed and pasteurized chokeberry juice!
juice.applicationText: The chokeberry juice has beneficial effects on the metabolism, the process of blood formation and the vitality of the body. Its regular consumption can lead to lowering of the blood pressure and blood sugar levels. Aronia juice is suitable for diabetics because of its lack of saccharose and high content of sorbitol. The antioxidants (vitamins, polyphenols) reduce the oxidative stress, caused for example by unhealthy diets, extreme physical/psychical exhaustion or radio- and chemotherapy. The chokeberry juice has benefical effects on people with high LDL-cholesterol levels (a.k.a. bad cholesterol) in the blood. Its consumption can slow down the building of atherogenic plaques on the walls of the blood vessels and thereby play important role in the prevention of cardiovascular diseases.
juice.storeText: Store in dry and well-ventilated area at 4 ° C to 20 ° C. The back-in-box allows you to use this product for several months without it getting rotten. After you have opened the box, do not turn it around but rather leave it in the same position (see picture above) till you finish the juice. This way it is not possible for air to enter into the juice and it will retain its good quality longer.
juice.noteText: Excessive consumption of the chokeberry juice can lead to rapid decrease in the blood pressure and eventually cause nausea. Therefore the recommendation (even for the cotreatment of high blood pressure) is to drink about 50 ml three times a day.

powder.intro: The organic aronia powder has no preservatives and no color additives. It is made of 100% micronized dried organic aronia.
powder.applicationText: The aronia powder can be added to yoghurt or flour (for different cakes). It improves the nutritional quality of different dishes and renders them unique taste and colour. The aronia powder is easily absorbed in the gastrointestinal tract. It strenghtens the organism and normalizes the its metabolism. Various tissues are being positively influenced by the consumption of aronia. Its use is being strongly recommended for people suffering from diabetes, cardiovascular diseases and/or metabolic syndrome.
powder.app_p: Recommended dose: 2 times daily as aftermeal mixed with yoghurt.
powder.storeText: Store in dry and ventilated place.

history.subheader: The company was founded by Taiwo & Nina Busari. We live in the small town of Dobrich, northeastern Bulgaria. Our very first plantations in 2008 led to the creation of our company later in 2013 - Organic Aronia LTD. As keen suporters of the biological production we grow our plants with no pesticides or chemical fertilizers. For several years we make a lot of effort to guarantee quality and safety for the products of aronia we offer you. To date we can deliver fresh and dried aronia, powder and juice. The company, which certificates the organic origin of our fruit is BALKAN BIOCERT.

bio.p-1: Nowadays, at the time of wild rush for more and faster, at the time of scientific progress and high farming, which has to feed the increasing Earth population, it looks like as if there is no place left for bringing back the traditional farming. But all this hurrying and trying to achieve much with very little effort is reflected in the quality of our food. And 'man is what he eats'. Therefore, if the twentieth century was marked by the influence of modern chemistry, in the twenty-first century people turn back to old time food quality. The mania on fast food gradually shifts from the pleasures of slow food. And what pleasure can there be in a rapidly grown and forcefully ripened tomato? So, by necessity, we need to replace the word 'chemical' in our food with 'biological' (or 'organic').
bio.p-2: BIO can be an abbreviation of all Bulgarian farming: Bulgarian Ideal Organic ... :) Beyond the pun 'Bio' or 'Organic' reflects the special quality of agricultural products produced without the use of synthetic fertilizers or any pesticides - herbicides, fungicides or zoocides. 'Bio' or 'organic' means free from chemicals.

adv.intro: Bio-farming is a way of producing organic agricultural products. We have to give prominence to mechanical elimination of weeds because we do not use herbicids. There is a place for the tractor too, but there is still much handwork to do. Pest control is done with hands or with cunning appliances and herb teas. The bio-farming is definitely not a dull and drag kind of job. It is a path wich encourages farmer`s creativity and inventiveness, a place where a man can and has to voice his excellence to the other creations given to him from God.
adv.li-1: Stops the use of chemical sinthetical products such as mineral compost for feeding up the soil, pesticides and for vegetable life defence or hormones of growth for agricultural animals.
adv.li-2: Uses balanced foodstuffs in the soil and the organic ground - improves the structure of the soil and the fruitfulness, protects the environment.
adv.li-3: Uses effectively the water, soil, plant and animal resources - the natural and local resources are used to the best advantage.
adv.li-4: Gives an opportunity of protecting the biological diversity and cultivation of more than one culture (for instance after cropping the land with aronia you can plant melons, watermelons, beans and others between the rows).

what-is.p-1: The species of aronia we grow is called black chockeberries (Aronia melanocarpa). They are 1-2m high bushes with shiny darkgrean leaves; in autumn the leaves turn a bold red color. The flowers are white or pale pink with glabrous sepals. That makes them attractive ornamental plants for gardens. The fruit is black, not persisting into winter. It looks like minature black apple, which hide some small seeds in them.
what-is.p-2: In Bulgaria, they mellow in the middle of august. Grown in the mountainous and hilly but still small areas. Resistant to low temperatures and pests and demanding only to humid soil and sunshine, this unpretentious, beautiful and very curative plant is a great reception in our country.

history.p-1: Aronia is native to North America. In Europe, the culture was first introduced in Germany. Later it reaches the inner part of the continent, where in the early 30s of last century was produced industrially in the USSR (Altai region, which currently has over 6,000 ha), and later in Russia, Belarus, Poland, Ukraine, Germany, Canada, USA, Denmark, Sweden and others.
history.p-2: In our country the first studies of culture in order to clarify the ability to be grown in Bulgaria started in the 60s. In the late 70s of last century were created the first state orchards from chokeberry in almost all regional cities. Engines of this process became two agronomic research institutes - Institute for Alpine Agriculture in Lovech and Fruit Growers Institute in Plovdiv. Especially extensive scientific studies have been made at the Supreme Forest Research Institute in Sofia, from a young student at the time, Dimitar Stoyanov, who after defending his dissertation on this plant became a professor at the same institute.

curative.p-1: Overwhelming presence of antioxidants in aronia helps preventing and reducing the risk of diseases caused by oxidative stress. Maintaining high elasticity and permeability of normal blood vessel walls, chokeberry juice lowers blood pressure, purifies the vascular wall of atherosclerotic plaques. Fresh juice aronia, taken in 50 ml three times a day has an excellent clinically proven effect against hypertension. It is invaluable for prophylactic and rehabilitation after stroke, heart attack and other diseases of the cardiovascular system.
curative.p-2: The combination of vitamins P and C helps the body to be released from radioactive substances and heavy metal ions. Aronia juice has hormone-like effect and contributes to the breakdown of adrenaline. It can be used successfully against cancerous growths. Aronia energizes the body, restores life force, helps overcome fatigue and nervous disorders, stimulates the regeneration of muscles and bone tissue, blood formation and metabolism.
curative.p-3: The aronia berries is characterized by a real richness of vitamins and minerals. The highest content is of vitamin P. In this regard aronia is an absolute record breaker among the fruits. Significant is the amount of potassium, calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, iron and among the trace elements the best provided are iodine, manganese, copper, molybdenum. Not fewer are the organic acids - citric, malic and succinic. Representative is the amount of pectin, tannins and coloring matter.

cultivation.p-plant: The creation of new plantations of chokeberry is preceded by a main soil treatment in depth of 40- 50 cm, and where there is no proper technique in depth of 30-35cm. Before the main treatment mainly fertilization is done (in option). In bio-farming mineral fertilizers are replaced with manure, compost or biohumus imported at the rate of 6-8 tons per decare or 8-10 kg of propagation pit. Best time for planting aronia is in autumn, 2-3 weeks before the permanent frost of the soil. The most common planting distance between rows is 3.5-4 m, and inside the lines - 2,5 m. In order not to produce many cuttings, young plants are planted in shallow.
cultivation.p-water: Aronia is light- and wet-loving plant. By the time the fruit get bigger, from late May to July, the plants need enough water. Additional watering of 5-10 liters per plant is needed by reduced rainfalls.
cultivation.p-prun: During the formation of the aronia bush pruning is more moderate in order not to grow many shoots. The highlight of the newly planted plants with 6-7 buds are cut. Then each year 4-5 new shoots are left and surpluses are removed. During the first 6-7 years after planting, major fruit-bearing branches shall not be removed. Only the weak, broken and lying on the soil surface shoots are removed. The proper pruning starts on the 6th or 7th year after planting and aims lightening and rejuvenation of the bush. Aronia, especially the bush type, is predisposed to bearing the fruit in the top. This leads to an extension of the branches that dip into the soil and so reduce yields and the fruit becomes petty. The purpose of pruning is to keep balance between the different age shoots in the bush; the shoots number should be around 30-35.

contacts.sub-header: Want to ask about prices, offers, partnership or just a couple of questions? Do not hesitate to contact us. We would be happy to talk with you!
